title: Slow cooked beef Stroganoff
ingredients: ['675g rump steak, cut into strips', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1/2 onion, chopped', '1 (295g) tin condensed cream of mushroom soup', '3/4 (300g) tin chopped mushrooms', '4 tablespoons water', '1 tablespoon dried chives', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 beef stock cube', '4 tablespoons white wine', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '450ml soured cream', '25g chopped fresh parsley']
